item.title: Need help with changing a command code please
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“announce”) && playerRights >= 3)
{
try {

		String announcement = command.substring(8);
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [ANNOUNCEMENT]: "+command.substring(8);
		sendMessage("You have successfully sent an announcement.");

		} catch(Exception e) {
		sendMessage("Wrong syntax! Use ::announce [ANNOUNCEMENT].");
		}

}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with changing a command code please

item.title: Need help with changing a command code please
item.dc:creator: @mudvayne5493 mudvayne5493
item.description:
@mudvayne5493 wrote:

Ok here is what i want to do =] I have the announce code but its not exactly what i want, here is the code…

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“announce”) && playerRights >= 3)
{
try {

		String announcement = command.substring(8);
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"'s [ANNOUNCEMENT]: "+command.substring(8);
		sendMessage("You have successfully sent an announcement.");

		} catch(Exception e) {
		sendMessage("Wrong syntax! Use ::announce [ANNOUNCEMENT].");
		}

}[/code]

Now when used it puts this in chat

mudvayne’s[ANNOUNCEMENT]: (text here)

I want it to say this

[SERVER MESSAGE]: (text here)
can someone help me do that? i seen it on roguex server and liked it lol i was co owner for a bit on roguex.
thanks for takin time tryin to help in advance

Read full topic
